Name: multiple cutaneous and mucosal venous malformations
Definition: An autosomal dominant disease that is characterized by multiple bluish cutaneous or mucosal venous lesions.

Name: venous insufficiency
Definition: A vein disease that is characterized by impaired flow of blood through the veins.

Name: esophageal varix
Definition: A parathyroid gland disease characterized by decreased function of parathyroid glands with underproduction of parathyroid hormone (PTH)
Synonym: esophageal varices without mention of bleeding

Name: portal vein thrombosis
Definition: A hepatic vascular disease that is characterized by a blood clot that forms within the hepatic portal vein.
Synonym: acute apical periodontitis of pulpal origin

Name: obsolete chronic hypomanic disorder
Definition: A hepatic vascular disease that is characterized by a blood clot that forms within the hepatic portal vein.

Name: obsolete intrathoracic lymph node tuberculosis
Definition: A lymph node tuberculosis that is characterized by a peri-hilar or paratracheal lymph adenopathy after the primary infection. Name: retinal vein occlusion
Definition: An organ system cancer that is located in the peritoneum.

Name: superior vena cava angiosarcoma
Definition: A cervical cancer that derives_from the fibrous connective tissue of the endometrium.
Synonym: angiosarcoma of the Superior Vena Cava

Name: pulmonary vein leiomyosarcoma
Definition: A leiomyosarcoma that is located_in the pulmonary vein.

Name: superior vena cava leiomyosarcoma
Definition: A leiomyosarcoma that is located_in the superior vena cava.
Synonym: leiomyosarcoma of the Superior Vena Cava

Name: obsolete superior vena cava malignant neoplasm
Definition: A leiomyosarcoma that is located_in the superior vena cava.
Synonym: malignant tumor of Superior Vena Cava

Name: phlebitis
Definition: A vein disease that is characterized by inflammation of a vein.
Synonym: Mental and behavioral disorder due to use of alcohol

Name: obsolete reticulosarcoma involving lymph nodes of multiple sites
Definition: A vein disease that is characterized by inflammation of a vein.
Synonym: Reticulosarcoma of lymph nodes of multiple sites (disorder)

Name: obsolete Hodgkin's paragranuloma involving lymph nodes of axilla and upper limb
Definition: A vein disease that is characterized by inflammation of a vein.
